sentences: Mis on alustatud, see tuleb ka lõpetada.
Oota, las ma lõpetan kirja ära.
Lõpetas klassi, kursuse, kooli, instituudi, tehnikumi kiitusega.
context: The Estonian word 'lõpeta' is an imperative form of the verb 'lõpetama', which means to finish, complete, or end something. It can refer to bringing a task, project, or activity to its conclusion, as well as ceasing ongoing activities. In some contexts, it can also mean to terminate or put an end to something permanently.
